spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent spatial alignment. Minor variations exist in the text labels (e.g., FOYER dimensions and DECK length text) rather than physical wall deviations.

structural_fidelity.notes: Walls and openings are perfectly matched. Small discrepancy in text values for BED-1 and TOI-1 dimensions, but the geometry remains consistent.

furniture_mapping.notes: All furniture items, including specific planter placements and rug patterns, are identical to the source.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The render is an extremely high-fidelity top-down orthogonal projection. Lighting and materials are clean and consistent.

detected_errors.description: Text label distortion: Deck dimensions changed from 25'5" x 5' to 22'6" x 5' despite geometry remaining same.
Text label distortion: Foyer dimension text changed from 5'x8'6" to 5'x6'8".
Text label distortion: Bed-1 vertical dimension changed from 16'8" to 18'9".
